title: Effective English Speaking Assessment Design in Online Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental English communication skills and understanding of job-related mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Developing the ability for manager/leader learners to present math-related job content in English using mobile devices in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Design online speaking assessment activities applying Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction.
Produce English presentation materials three or more times combining asynchronous/synchronous methods in a mobile environment.
Create and submit a video within five minutes explaining mathematical job content in English through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
